segments.text: I walk in and whoa, the sink's pouring water out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's like a waterfall over the edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lady's drying dishes right in front of it, unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Puddle's forming fast on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over by the cabinets, the boy's on a stool reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's got his hand in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The little girl is right there, asking for cookies too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky behind mom's back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden through the window is beautiful and sunny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I didn't expect this kind of excitement in a kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR
